featured.text: In lucid dreams, however, we are completely immersed in the dream world.
When a person is having a lucid dream, the person’s body is 27 ; when a person daydreams, his/her body is awake.
The term “lucid” means clear; lucid dreamers know that they are dreaming and 26 they are dreaming of.
Yet, lucid dreaming is 28 just having a clear dream.
This kind of dream is called a “lucid dream.”

definition.en_def: Clear and easy to understand; able to think clearly, especially during periods of confusion.
definition.example: Her explanation was so lucid that everyone understood the complex topic.
